contexts.context: ...pro quibus eisdem prẹsidatus Sueviẹ a sacro imperio in <mark>pignus</mark> inscriptus est, certa ẹdifitia et structuras in castro...
...substantia vel inposterum erit gravandi, onerandi et ad <mark>pignus</mark> ac hypothecam obstringendi et insuper quibuscunque aliis personis quascunque...
